phrases.phrase: 이 궁에는 고요한 정원, 연못, 다리가 곳곳에 있습니다.
meanings: 역사 유적지 This palace is dotted with tranquil gardens, ponds, and bridges.
around the world, all over the world

examples.korean: tourists from every corner of the globe 발음듣기 세계 곳곳에서 오는 관광객들 Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: tourists from every corner of the globe 발음

examples.korean: The paint was peeling off the wall in places. 발음듣기 페인트가 그 벽의 곳곳에서 벗겨지고 있었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The paint was peeling off the wall in places. 발음

examples.korean: Patches of fog will clear by mid-morning. 발음듣기 곳곳에 낀 안개는 오전 중반에는 걷히겠습니다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Patches of fog will clear by mid-morning. 발음

examples.korean: Early morning mist patches will soon clear. 발음듣기 곳곳에 낀 이른 아침의 박무는 곧 걷히겠습니다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Early morning mist patches will soon clear. 발음

examples.korean: The heavy rain has caused floods in many parts of the country. 발음듣기 그 폭우로 인하여 나라 곳곳에 홍수가 났다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The heavy rain has caused floods in many parts of the country. 발음
